pullRequest.title: [Admin REST API] - API to retrieve scope- role mapping
pullRequest.bodyText:
The Scope Role Mapping List resource

ScopeList:
title: Scope Role Mapping List
properties:
count:
type: integer
description: |
Number of scopes available for tenant.
example: 60
list:
type: array
items:
$ref: '#/definitions/Scope'

The Scope Role resource

Scope:
title: Scope Role
properties:
tag:
type: string
description: |
Portal name.
example: "publisher"
name:
type: string
description: |
Scope name.
example: "apim:api_publish"
description:
type: string
description: |
About scope.
example: "Publish API"
roles:
schema:
type: array
items:
type: string
description: |
Roles for the particular scope.
example: ["admin","Internal/publisher"]

Request: curl -k -X GET "https://localhost:9443/api/am/admin/v1/system-scopes" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer 423174ca-1311-3161-9b35-a2ff90539650"
Response :
{
"count":5,
"list":[
{
"tag":"admin",
"name":"apim:api_product_import_export",
"description":"Import and export API Products",
"roles":"admin"
},
{
"tag":"admin",
"name":"apim:monetization_usage_publish",
"description":"Retrieve and publish Monetization related usage records",
"roles":"admin, Internal/publisher"
},
{
"tag":"publisher",
"name":"apim:api_delete",
"description":"Delete API",
"roles":"admin,Internal/creator"
},
{
"tag":"store",
"name":"apim:app_manage",
"description":"Retrieve, Manage applications",
"roles":"admin,Internal/subscriber"
},
{
"tag":"store",
"name":"apim:api_key",
"description":"Generate API Keys",
"roles":"admin,Internal/subscriber"
}
]
}
Fix wso2/product-apim#8201

nodes.bodyText: Why are we catching a generic exception here?

Why is this method synchronized?
Please see the next comment

Before returning, we need to store this scopeDTOs a class-level variable with a proper synchronization mechanism. When calling this method again we can just return that without going into the nested loops. Otherwise, going through this over and over again when calling the method is not a good idea.
Can you have a look at https://www.cs.umd.edu/~pugh/java/memoryModel/DoubleCheckedLocking.html under "Fixing Double-Checked Locking using Volatile"
Shall we rename this method to getScopesInfoFromAPIYamlDefinitions?
